message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $12,000. I believe it holds significant value and will be very beneficial to you.
I'm interested in the product, but $12,000 is a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $9,000 for it. Can you consider my offer?
Thanks for your interest, Bob.  I understand your position, but I can't go as low as $9,000. Could you do $10,500?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, $10,500 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $9,800 for the product. Can you consider my revised offer?
